name: Super Hero Robot Sniper
description:
we are here with the new super hero robot sniper assassin: anti-terror war. first time enjoy metal super hero in ultimate survival avatar to save the dying city of darkness. robots and cyborgs are not enough so it is time for the ultimate super hero robot sniper assassin to rescue the country with all the super hero powers he got. the city needs the super hero to survive. if you are a robot game lover and have been playing transformer battle games and super hero games than you will also love this game. no future fun anymore it’s all about real super hero rescue games. this super hero anti-terrorist city survival game of 2017 will become one of your favorite games. you will love the game play and the graphics of this best city survival game. you will have to eliminate all the gangsters of this city. once you move into the territory of the enemies you have to clear the area. make sure all the bad guys are finished from the area. different challenging levels and attractive game play will make you indulge in the super hero anti-terror sniper war.

you are the best this city has got and you will use all your powers in order to clean the city from these mafia criminals. it’s time to help the citizens of your country. they really need your help specially the children and women of the city are terrified with this spree of gangsters they are also suffering from hunger and sickness. so be quick and jump into the fray. show the gangsters and mafia criminals that, this is your city and they cannot take it like this. show them that, you are the ultimate super sniper and man of steel of this city and super survival hero in this new adventure of super hero sniper assassin of 2017.
